verses.verse: וֶאֱלִישָׁ֡ע <WH477> Elisha דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> Then spake אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִשָּׁה֩ <WH802> unto the woman אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> wheresoever הֶחֱיָ֨ה <WH2421> he had restored to life אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנָ֜הּ <WH1121> whose son לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying ק֤וּמִי <WH6965> Arise וּלְכִי֙ <WH1980> and go [אַתִּי כ] (אַ֣תְּ <WH859> you ק) וּבֵיתֵ֔ךְ <WH1004> thou and thine household וְג֖וּרִי <WH1481> and sojourn בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> wherever תָּג֑וּרִי <WH1481> thou canst sojourn כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָרָ֤א <WH7121> hath called יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> for the LORD לָֽרָעָ֔ב <WH7458> for a famine וְגַם־ <WH1571> will even בָּ֥א <WH935> and it shall also come אֶל־ <WH413> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> upon the land שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַתָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> arose הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> And the woman וַתַּ֕עַשׂ <WH6213> and did כִּדְבַ֖ר <WH1697> after the saying אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וַתֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went הִיא֙ <WH1931> he וּבֵיתָ֔הּ <WH1004> with her household וַתָּ֥גָר <WH1481> and sojourned בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> of the Philistines שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become מִקְצֵה֙ <WH7097> end שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> And it came to pass at the seven שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years' וַתָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> returned הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> that the woman מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַתֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> and she went forth לִצְעֹ֣ק <WH6817> to cry אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּיתָ֖הּ <WH1004> for her house וְאֶל־ <WH413> and שָׂדָֽהּ׃ <WH7704> and for her land

וְהַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> talked אֶל־ <WH413> with גֵּ֣חֲזִ֔י <WH1522> with Gehazi נַ֥עַר <WH5288> the servant אִישׁ־ <WH376> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying סַפְּרָה־ <WH5608> Tell נָּ֣א <WH4994> Please לִ֔י אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגְּדֹל֖וֹת <WH1419> me I pray thee all the great things אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> hath done אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <WH477> that Elisha

וַ֠יְהִי <WH1961> become ה֥וּא <WH1931> he מְסַפֵּ֣ר <WH5608> And it came to pass as he was telling לַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <WH4428> the king אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> how הֶחֱיָ֣ה <WH2421> to life אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֵּת֒ <WH4191> a dead body וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <WH802> that behold the woman אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose הֶחֱיָ֤ה <WH2421> he had restored to life אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנָהּ֙ <WH1121> whose son צֹעֶ֣קֶת <WH6817> cried אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king עַל־ <WH5921> for בֵּיתָ֖הּ <WH1004> for her house וְעַל־ <WH5921> and for שָׂדָ֑הּ <WH7704> and for her land וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said גֵּֽחֲזִי֙ <WH1522> And Gehazi אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> My lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> O king זֹ֚את <WH2063> likewise הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> this [is] the woman וְזֶה־ <WH2088> this בְּנָ֖הּ <WH1121> and this [is] her son אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הֶחֱיָ֥ה <WH2421> restored to life אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <WH477> whom Elisha

וַיִּשְׁאַ֥ל <WH7592> asked הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> And when the king לָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> the woman וַתְּסַפֶּר־ <WH5608> she told ל֑וֹ וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> appointed לָ֣הּ הַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <WH4428> him So the king סָרִ֨יס <WH5631> officer אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> unto her a certain לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying הָשֵׁ֤יב <WH7725> Restore אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לָהּ֙ וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all תְּבוּאֹ֣ת <WH8393> all that [was] hers and all the fruits הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> of the field מִיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> since the day עָזְבָ֥ה <WH5800> that she left אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land וְעַד־ <WH5704> until עָֽתָּה׃ <WH6258> now פ

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> came אֱלִישָׁע֙ <WH477> And Elisha דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> to Damascus וּבֶן־ הֲדַ֥ד <WH1130> and Benhadad מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> of Syria חֹלֶ֑ה <WH2470> was sick וַיֻּגַּד־ <WH5046> and it was told ל֣וֹ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> him saying בָּ֛א <WH935> is come אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> The man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God עַד־ <WH5704> against הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2008> hither

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶל־ <WH413> to חֲזָהאֵ֗ל <WH2371> unto Hazael קַ֤ח <WH3947> Take בְּיָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> in thine hand מִנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> a present וְלֵ֕ךְ <WH1980> and go לִקְרַ֖את <WH7125> meet אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֨ <WH1875> and enquire אֶת־ <WH854> for יְהוָ֤ה <WH3069> God מֵֽאוֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> by him saying הַאֶחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> Shall I recover מֵחֳלִ֥י <WH2483> disease זֶֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went חֲזָאֵל֮ <WH2371> So Hazael לִקְרָאתוֹ֒ <WH7125> to meet וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> him and took מִנְחָ֤ה <WH4503> a present בְיָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> with him וְכָל־ <WH3605> every ט֣וּב <WH2898> even of every good thing דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> burden אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty גָּמָ֑ל <WH1581> camels' וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> and came וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> and stood לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> before וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> him and said בִּנְךָ֨ <WH1121> Thy son בֶן־ הֲדַ֤ד <WH1130> Benhadad מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אֲרָם֙ <WH758> of Syria שְׁלָחַ֤נִי <WH7971> hath sent אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> to לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> me to thee saying הַאֶחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> Shall I recover מֵחֳלִ֥י <WH2483> disease זֶֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> then אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <WH477> And Elisha לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> Go אֱמָר־ <WH559> say [לֹא כ] (לֹ֖ו <WH3808> not ק) חָיֹ֣ה <WH2421> unto him Thou mayest certainly תִחְיֶ֑ה <WH2421> recover וְהִרְאַ֥נִי <WH7200> hath shewed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> howbeit the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מ֥וֹת <WH4191> me that he shall surely יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> die

וַיַּעֲמֵ֥ד <WH5975> And he settled אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> his countenance וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <WH7760> stedfastly עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּ֑שׁ <WH954> until he was ashamed וַיֵּ֖בְךְּ <WH1058> wept אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and the man הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said חֲזָאֵ֔ל <WH2371> And Hazael מַדּ֖וּעַ <WH4069> Why אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> my lord בֹכֶ֑ה <WH1058> Why weepeth וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> said כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because יָדַ֡עְתִּי <WH3045> Because I know אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you תַּעֲשֶׂה֩ <WH6213> that thou wilt do לִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel רָעָ֗ה <WH7451> the evil מִבְצְרֵיהֶ֞ם <WH4013> their strong holds תְּשַׁלַּ֤ח <WH7971> wilt thou set בָּאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> on fire וּבַחֻֽרֵיהֶם֙ <WH970> and their young men בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> with the sword תַּהֲרֹ֔ג <WH2026> wilt thou slay וְעֹלְלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5768> their children תְּרַטֵּ֔שׁ <WH7376> and wilt dash וְהָרֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2030> their women with child תְּבַקֵּֽעַ׃ <WH1234> and rip up

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said חֲזָהאֵ֔ל <WH2371> And Hazael כִּ֣י <WH3588> But מָ֤ה <WH4100> what עַבְדְּךָ֙ <WH5650> But what [is] thy servant הַכֶּ֔לֶב <WH3611> a dog כִּ֣י <WH3588> should יַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> that he should do הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> act הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> this great הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <WH477> Elisha הִרְאַ֧נִי <WH7200> hath shewed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD אֹתְךָ֖ <WH854> that מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> me that thou [shalt be] king עַל־ <WH5921> over אֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> over Syria

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ ׀ <WH1980> departed מֵאֵ֣ת אֱלִישָׁ֗ע <WH477> from Elisha וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> and came אֶל־ אֲדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> to his master וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> who said ל֔וֹ מָֽה־ <WH4100> What אָמַ֥ר <WH559> to him What said לְךָ֖ אֱלִישָׁ֑ע <WH477> Elisha וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> to thee? And he answered אָ֥מַר <WH559> He told לִ֖י חָיֹ֥ה <WH2421> me [that] thou shouldest surely תִחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> recover

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <WH4283> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> that he took הַמַּכְבֵּר֙ <WH4346> a thick cloth וַיִּטְבֹּ֣ל <WH2881> and dipped בַּמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> [it] in water וַיִּפְרֹ֥שׂ <WH6566> and spread עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> [it] on his face וַיָּמֹ֑ת <WH4191> so that he died וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigned חֲזָהאֵ֖ל <WH2371> and Hazael תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ

וּבִשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year חָמֵ֗שׁ <WH2568> And in the fifth לְיוֹרָ֤ם <WH3141> of Joram בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַחְאָב֙ <WH256> of Ahab מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וִיהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> Jehoshaphat מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> [being] then king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah מָלַ֛ךְ <WH4427> began to reign יְהוֹרָ֥ם <WH3088> Jehoram בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> Thirty וּשְׁתַּ֛יִם <WH8147> and two שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <WH4427> was he when he began to reign וּשְׁמֹנֶ֣ה <WH8083> eight [שָׁנָה כ] (שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years ק) מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וַיֵּ֜לֶךְ <WH1980> walked בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ ׀ <WH1870> in the way מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> as did בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> of Ahab כִּ֚י <WH3588> for בַּת־ <WH1323> for the daughter אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> of Ahab הָֽיְתָה־ <WH1961> became לּ֖וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> was his wife וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> was not אָבָ֤ה <WH14> would יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yet the LORD לְהַשְׁחִ֣ית <WH7843> not destroy אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> the sake דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> for David עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> his servant's כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he אָֽמַר־ <WH559> sake as he promised ל֗וֹ לָתֵ֨ת <WH5414> him to give ל֥וֹ נִ֛יר <WH5216> a light לְבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> [and] to his children כָּל־ <WH3605> him הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> him alway

בְּיָמָיו֙ <WH3117> In his days פָּשַׁ֣ע <WH6586> revolted אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> Edom מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under יַד־ <WH3027> from under the hand יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיַּמְלִ֥כוּ <WH4427> and made עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> a king

וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ר <WH5674> went over יוֹרָם֙ <WH3141> So Joram צָעִ֔ירָה <WH6811> to Zair וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָרֶ֖כֶב <WH7393> and all the chariots עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> become ה֞וּא <WH1931> and he קָ֣ם <WH6965> with him and he rose לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> by night וַיַּכֶּ֨ה <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> אֱד֜וֹם <WH123> the Edomites הַסֹּבֵ֤יב <WH5437> which compassed him about אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and the captains הָרֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> of the chariots וַיָּ֥נָס <WH5127> fled הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and the people לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <WH168> into their tents

וַיִּפְשַׁ֣ע <WH6586> revolted אֱד֗וֹם <WH123> Yet Edom מִתַּ֙חַת֙ <WH8478> Thahash יַד־ <WH3027> from under the hand יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this אָ֛ז <WH227> Then תִּפְשַׁ֥ע <WH6586> revolted לִבְנָ֖ה <WH3841> Then Libnah בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> time הַהִֽיא׃ <WH1931> at the same

וְיֶ֛תֶר <WH3499> And the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts יוֹרָ֖ם <WH3141> of Joram וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> and all that he did הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah
